5.26. quote Filter

Interface

The general syntax is:

  !block quote
  ...
  !endblock

See Understanding Filter Interfaces, if necessary.

Description

The quote filter is used to format a quotation. This typically implies:

  • for PostScript, the text is italics and indented from both margins
  • for HTML, the text is given an appropriate style.
